db_body.body: SELECT UPPER(C.CONTYPE) AS CONSTRAINT_TYPE, CAST(CASE WHEN UPPER(C.CONTYPE) = 'C' THEN 'Check' WHEN UPPER(C.CONTYPE) = 'P' THEN 'Primary Key' WHEN UPPER(C.CONTYPE) = 'F' THEN 'Foreign Key' WHEN UPPER(C.CONTYPE) = 'U' THEN 'Unique' WHEN UPPER(C.CONTYPE) = 'V' THEN 'with Check Option' ELSE 'não conhecido' END AS VARCHAR(17)) AS TIPO, C1.RELNAME AS TABLE_NAME, CAST(CASE WHEN C.CONVALIDATED THEN 'ENABLED' ELSE 'DISABLED' END AS VARCHAR(8)) AS STATUS, CASE WHEN UPPER(C.CONTYPE) = 'F' THEN C2.RELNAME ELSE NULL END AS R_CONSTRAINT_NAME, N1.NSPNAME AS R_OWNER, NULL AS SEARCH_CONDITION, N1.NSPNAME AS OWNER, C.CONNAME AS CONSTRAINT_NAME FROM PG_CATALOG.PG_CONSTRAINT C LEFT JOIN PG_CATALOG.PG_CLASS C1 ON C1.OID = C.CONRELID LEFT JOIN PG_CATALOG.PG_CLASS C2 ON C2.OID = C.CONINDID LEFT JOIN PG_CATALOG.PG_NAMESPACE N1 ON (N1.OID = C1.RELNAMESPACE)
